title: Minimal water heating script
description: With this minimal script, it is possible to control water heating based on spot-prices. Required: Shelly firmware 1.0.0 or later.

title: Spot-price and Rank controlled relays
description: With this script it is possible to control two different relays by using price limit and cheapest hours option. Required: Shelly firmware 1.0.0 or later.

title: Weather forecast adjusted Rank and Spot-price controlled relays
description: With this script, it is possible to control 1-3 relays according to the weather forecast adjusted hours. Required: Shelly firmware 1.0.0 or later.

title: Monitoring script
description: This script monitors other script statuses and Internet connection. Scripts are restarted and Shelly rebooted when needed.
